name: Atrapasueños
description:
A journey through an abstract art world. Explore the islands, traverse the jumping puzzles and enjoy the art style in this short journey through atrapasueños. Are you able to escape the dream?

A game based on the concept art "Atrapasueños" by Gabriel Mourelle.

  • Notes:
    • The game requires an Xbox or ps4 controller.
    • RT/R2 - Sprint | A/X - Jump
    • The game is not optimized and might not run on lower-end hardware.
